response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, we are confident it would be an invaluable asset to your business. We are offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000, a significant discount from its market value of $1,000,000. This offer is exclusive to you and is valid for the next 48 hours. Should you decide to proceed, we assure you of prompt delivery and unparalleled customer support throughout the process. Please let us know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you and contribute to the growth of your enterprise.", "product_price": 950000}
